text: Rheinpark Stadion is a football stadium in Vaduz, Liechtenstein. It is the home stadium of FC Vaduz and the Liechtenstein national football team. It is on the banks of the river Rhine, just metres from the border with Switzerland. It has a capacity of 7,584. The stadium was opened on 31 July 1998. == Other websites == * Liechtenstein FA website * FC Vaduz website Category:1998 establishments in Europe Category:Football stadiums in Europe Category:Football in Liechtenstein Category:Vaduz
title: Rheinpark Stadion
